review: Hotel is very neat & clean Excellent Service Hotel staff is very help full. The  major thing is Holy Ganga near 20 step Break fast lunch Dinner beside & in front of the Hotel tea stall 24 hrs open CCD in front of hotel. Cheap & Best Hotel all over Haridwar as i feel and enjoy.

It's an average budget property right there on the har ki paudi. We got a room for 1000 Rupees for a single day. All the restaurants and eating joints are near by. Location is the USP. Overall a comfortable stay.
name: Akhil S
